Posts.Content: Dear all  I had my Micro bubbles biopsy done for the lymph nodes just over 1 week ago . It was only about 10 mins to have it done . Although uncomfortable its not painful. I found out on Monday that my cancer has not spread to the lymph nodes. How ever they told me that the oncology specialist will give me an appointment for the end of this week or beginning of next. I have not heard any thing as of yet .  This has left me feeling anxcious and fed up , but not sure why. Im also feeling a little down . Has any one else had feelings like this as well ?
Posts.Title: feeling fed up and down

Posts.Content: Hi All I finished my treatment in May . I had breast cancer which I had it have chemotherapy , an op and radiotherapy. My husband seems to think I should be full of energy and getting back to work. I've been applying for jobs but no luck yet . The thing is he expects me to be able to go back to full time work . All he seems to care about is getting more money. I'm coming so close to asking him to leave as he moans at me all the time . About money and me getting a job
Posts.Title: How to tell my husband
